prompt: <description>**Part 1 Instructions** Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The sides are parallel and the top and bottom faces are perpendicular to the sides. The dimensions of the sides are equal and the height is half the length of the sides. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with euler angles of [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] and translation vector of [0.0, 0.0, 0.0]. Next, create a sketch on face 1 of the coordinate system. The sketch will consist of one face with loop 1 containing 4 lines. The lines are as follows: - line 1: starting point [0.0, 0.0] and ending point [0.75, 0.0] - line 2: starting point [0.75, 0.0] and ending point [0.75, 0.375] - line 3: starting point [0.75, 0.375] and ending point [0.0, 0.375] - line 4: starting point [0.0, 0.375] and ending point [0.0, 0.0] After creating the sketch, scale it by a factor of 0.75. Then, extrude the sketch by 0.75 units in the direction of the normal. **Part 2 Instructions** Create a second three-dimensional rectangular prism that will join with the first part. The sides are parallel and the top and bottom faces are perpendicular to the sides. The dimensions of the sides are equal and the height is half the length of the sides. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with euler angles of [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] and translation vector of [0.0, 0.375, 0.0]. Next, create a sketch on face 1 of the coordinate system. The sketch will consist of one face with loop 1 containing 4 lines. The lines are as follows: - line 1: starting point [0.0, 0.0] and ending point [0.75, 0.0] - line 2: starting point [0.75, 0.0] and ending point [0.75, 0.375] - line 3: starting point [0.75, 0.375] and ending point [0.0, 0.375] - line 4: starting point [0.0, 0.375] and ending point [0.0, 0.0] After creating the sketch, scale it by a factor of 0.75. Then, extrude the sketch by 0.375 units in the direction of the normal. Use the "JoinFeatureOperation" to join the second part with the first part. The final shape will be a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a slightly tapered top and bottom. The sides of the prism are parallel and meet at right angles. The prism is centered on a white background. The length, width, and height of the final shape are 0.75 units.</description>
